titles: A defence of Dr. Sherlock's notion of a Trinity in unity in answer to the animadversions upon his vindication of the doctrine of the holy and ever Blessed Trinity : with a post-script relating to the calm discourse of a Trinity in the Godhead : in a letter to a friend.
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Half title reads: A defence of Dr. Sherlock's notion of a Trinity in unity, &c.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
